conversations.content: Please check and update my rent payment for the next month.

<function_thought>
To fulfill the user request regarding their rent payment for the next month, I need to retrieve the list of scheduled transactions first. This will help me identify if there is already a scheduled rent payment. Once retrieved, I can determine if any updates are needed for the rent payment transaction.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_scheduled_transactions()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

- amount: 50.0
  date: '2022-04-01'
  id: 6
  recipient: SE3550000000054910000003
  recurring: true
  sender: DE89370400440532013000
  subject: Spotify Premium
- amount: 1100.0
  date: '2022-04-04'
  id: 7
  recipient: US122000000121212121212
  recurring: false
  sender: DE89370400440532013000
  subject: Rent

<function_thought>
I found a scheduled transaction for rent with the following details:
- Amount: 1100.0
- Date: 2022-04-04
- Recipient: US122000000121212121212
- Subject: Rent

Since the rent payment is not set for the next month but in April, I will need to update this transaction to reflect the next month’s payment instead. I will set the date to the appropriate date next month (considering the next month will be May). The recurring status can remain as false unless specified otherwise.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[update_scheduled_transaction(id=7, date="2022-05-04", recipient="US122000000121212121212", amount=1100.0, subject="Rent", recurring=None)]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The update for the rent payment transaction has been successfully completed, and the transaction for May has been set. The task is accomplished as per the user's request.
</function_thought>

<final_answer>
The rent payment has been successfully updated for next month (May 4, 2022) with the amount of 1100.0. If you need any further changes or assistance, feel free to ask!
</final_answer>
